body: You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying. Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has –1 or fewer hit points. That creature begins dying, taking 1 point of damage per round. The creature can be stabilized later normally. This spell causes a creature that is dying to take 1 point of damage.
description: Cause a stabilized creature to resume dying.
level_text: Cleric: 0; Inquisitor: 0; Oracle: 0; Sorcerer: 0; Witch: 0; Wizard: 0
name: Bleed
